item.description:
Entrain is an awesome band, have seen them couple times!!

Epic in sound and kaleidoscopic in vision, the eclectic Martha's Vineyard-based six piece Entrain has been thrilling critics and fans alike since it's inception. Entrain has jammed with the likes of singer/songwriter James Taylor, Grateful Dead Alum Bob Weir and rock legend Bo Diddley. But Entrain's goal is not just to be the biggest and the best, says founding member Tom Major, "We wanna create music that makes people feel good. When we look out from the stage, all we see is smiling faces and bodies moving. You can't beat that feeling."

Come on out enjoy some great music and have fun!

For The Narrows and ticket information visit: http://www.ncfta.org/tickets.php
Seating is general admission first come first serve. Get your tickets today-this is a very popular local area band and will most likely sell out! $18 Advance | $20 Day of Show

For more on Entrain visit: http://www.entrain.com/

Carpooling suggested! It's about a 45 minute ride from Blackstone. Those who have a van type vehicle and want to be a responsible driver please let me know. Thank you in advance!
item.name: ENTRAIN
